description: The Seattle Sling protects your gear while you’re on the move. Whether you’re hiking the rain-forests of Perú, sailing the San Juans, kayaking Prince William Sound, or riding an adventure bike from Paris to Dakar, the Seattle Sling will keep your gear protected from the elements.No zippers:proven dry-bag technology works every timeRoll three times:dirt, dust, sand, and water stay outImpact protection:padded inner box keeps your gear safeQuick access to your gear:don’t miss a shot
title: MADE Products CA-2001-BLK Seattle Sling Waterproof Bag (Black)
